Text.Name: LsCalmHeart
Text.Desc: Use on an ally character so that they won't need food, water or sleep for 3 days, but their movement will become slow.

Text.Name: LsShapeshift
Text.Desc: Delays an ally character's Shapeshifting Tribulation at the cost of their lifespan.
Text.TargetDesc: Select an ally who has the shapeshifting tribulation.

Text.Name: LsLingWater
Text.Desc: Turns an area into Spirit Soil at the cost of their own growth and nutrition. However, water nearby will all become normal water.
Text.TargetDesc: Select an empty area on the ground.
